# Minimum CMake version required
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13)
# Raises a FATAL_ERROR if version < specified version
cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 3.12 FATAL_ERROR)

# Include the Pico SDK
include($ENV{PICO_SDK_PATH}/external/pico_sdk_import.cmake)
add_compile_definitions(
        PICO_XOSC_STARTUP_DELAY_MULTIPLIER=64 # facilitate crystal startup issues
)

# We define the name of our project, and this changes some directories
# naming convention generated by CMake. We can send the LANG of code
# as the second parameter
project(PX_PRG_4EA C CXX ASM)

# Set the language standard
set(CMAKE_C_STANDARD 11)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)

# Initialize the Raspberry Pico SDK
if (PICO_SDK_VERSION_STRING VERSION_LESS "1.3.0")
    message(FATAL_ERROR "Raspberry Pi Pico SDK version 1.3.0 (or later) required. Your version is ${PICO_SDK_VERSION_STRING}")
endif()
pico_sdk_init()

add_compile_options(-Wall
        -Wno-format          # int != int32_t as far as the compiler is concerned because gcc has int32_t as long int
        -Wno-unused-function # we have some for the docs that aren't called
)

#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Targets
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Subdirectories to compile (Projects)
add_subdirectory(student-packages)
add_subdirectory(teacher-packeges)
